segment.source: The Solutions for Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) guide provides documentation that presents example customer scenarios that are solved by using technologies that are part of the MDOP suite.
segment.target: The Solutions for Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) guide provides documentation that presents example customer scenarios that are solved by using technologies that are part of the MDOP suite.

segment.source: Deploying Microsoft Office 2013 by Using App-V
segment.target: Deploying Microsoft Office 2013 by Using App-V

segment.source: This solution explains how to deploy Office 2013 by using App-V 5.0 and includes procedures for customization, upgrading, and licensing for deployment in the enterprise.
segment.target: This solution explains how to deploy Office 2013 by using App-V 5.0 and includes procedures for customization, upgrading, and licensing for deployment in the enterprise.

segment.source: Deploying Microsoft Office 2010 by Using App-V
segment.target: Deploying Microsoft Office 2010 by Using App-V

segment.source: This solution explains how to deploy Office 2010 by using App-V 5.0.
segment.target: This solution explains how to deploy Office 2010 by using App-V 5.0.

segment.source: Creating App-V 4.5 Databases Using SQL Scripting
segment.target: Creating App-V 4.5 Databases Using SQL Scripting

segment.source: This solution explains and documents the procedure to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Server when the administrator installing does not have “sysadmin” privileges to the SQL Server.
segment.target: This solution explains and documents the procedure to install the Microsoft Application Virtualization Server when the administrator installing does not have “sysadmin” privileges to the SQL Server.

segment.source: This solution explains and how the App-V Client processes packages and presents them to users.
segment.target: This solution explains and how the App-V Client processes packages and presents them to users.

segment.source: It includes typical client operations with important locations for data storage, how the publishing refresh process works, and the available integration points with the local operating system.
segment.target: It includes typical client operations with important locations for data storage, how the publishing refresh process works, and the available integration points with the local operating system.

segment.source: How to Download and Deploy MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates
segment.target: How to Download and Deploy MDOP Group Policy (.admx) Templates

segment.source: You can manage the feature settings of certain Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) technologies (for example, App-V, UE-V, or MBAM) by using Group Policy templates, the .admx and .adml files.
segment.target: You can manage the feature settings of certain Microsoft Desktop Optimization Pack (MDOP) technologies (for example, App-V, UE-V, or MBAM) by using Group Policy templates, the .admx and .adml files.

segment.source: MDOP Group Policy templates are available for download in a self-extracting, compressed file, grouped by technology and version.
segment.target: MDOP Group Policy templates are available for download in a self-extracting, compressed file, grouped by technology and version.
